about_the_game:
3DMark Time Spy

Time Spy is a DirectX 12 benchmark test for gaming PCs running Windows 10. With its pure DirectX 12 engine, built from the ground up to support new API features like asynchronous compute, explicit multi-adapter, and multi-threading, Time Spy is the ideal benchmark for testing the DirectX 12 performance of modern graphics cards.
detailed_description:
3DMark Time Spy

Time Spy is a DirectX 12 benchmark test for gaming PCs running Windows 10. With its pure DirectX 12 engine, built from the ground up to support new API features like asynchronous compute, explicit multi-adapter, and multi-threading, Time Spy is the ideal benchmark for testing the DirectX 12 performance of modern graphics cards.
name: 3DMark Time Spy benchmark

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS:Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor:1.8Ghz Dual-Core CPU with SSSE3 support
  • Memory:4 GB
  • Graphics:DirectX 12
  • Video memory:1.7 GB
  • Storage:3 GB free space

short_description: Time Spy is a DirectX 12 benchmark test for gaming PCs running Windows 10. With its pure DirectX 12 engine, Time Spy is the ideal test for benchmarking modern graphics cards.
supported_languages: English, German, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil
